msg.autoswitch.config.1: AutoSwitch configs are in the config folder.
msg.autoswitch.config.2: Do not open or decompile AutoSwitch to change them!
msg.autoswitch.config.3: A quick way to get there is to go to Options, then Open Resource Pack Folder.
msg.autoswitch.config.4: Then go up a level so you're in your minecraft folder. You will see a config folder.
msg.autoswitch.config.5: In the config folder will be your configs.
button.autoswitch.openwiki: Open Wiki Page on Why There is No GUI
